content: the sleeve is round repeat for second sleeve 4 with color d crochet 3 row of 26 clusters starting from the bottom of the back piece this will make an opening for the sleeves *do not attach to the front side yet 5 with color d sew the sleeve onto the opening you want your seam to be in the middle of the side of your new 3 cluster row 6 sew your new 3 cluster row to your front piece repeat steps 4-5 for the other side 7 single_crochet a border around the bottom of the dress and your sleeves 8 wet block 9 rock your dress take a pic so i can see what an amazing job you did
